    Method and Description
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.Guild.addChannel(Channel)
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.Channel.addMessage(Message)
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.Guild.addUser(User)
    sx.blah.discord.api.IDiscordClient.createInvite(int, int, boolean, boolean, String)
    Use Channel.createInvite(int, int, boolean, boolean)
    sx.blah.discord.api.IDiscordClient.deleteMessage(String, String)
    Use Message.delete()
    sx.blah.discord.api.IDiscordClient.editMessage(String, String, String)
    Use Message.edit(String)
    sx.blah.discord.api.internal.DiscordUtils.escapeString(String)
    No longer required for discord to handle special characters
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.Channel.getParent()
    Use Channel.getGuild() instead.
    sx.blah.discord.api.IDiscordClient.getTypingStatus(String)
    Use Channel.getTypingStatus()
    sx.blah.discord.api.IDiscordClient.sendMessage(String, String)
    Use Channel.sendMessage(String)
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.User.setAvatar(String)
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.Message.setContent(String)
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.User.setGame(Optional<String>)

    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.User.setName(String)
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.User.setPresence(Presences)
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.Message.setTimestamp(LocalDateTime)
    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.Channel.setTopic(String)
    sx.blah.discord.api.IDiscordClient.toggleTypingStatus(String)
    Use Channel.toggleTypingStatus()
